reviewText: Santa Clause movies are the best!  Santa Clause 2 is one of my favorites.
Great, must see Christmas movies every year!

These are two MUST SEE movies for Christmas viewing!!! Both are appropriate for children as there is no swearing. My family watches both of them each and every Christmas and still laugh out loud!!  Get the popcorn and eggnog ready and get in the Christmas spirit early!!
bought the trilogy of Tim Allen's "Santa Claus" movies.  They are all good fun and bring a lot laughter to the Christmas season.  Family loved it. A+
